title: Determination of lethal and mutation induction doses of gamma rays for gladiolus (Gladiolus grandifloras Hort.) genotypes

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Anand Singh Rawat, B.D. Bhuj, Ranjan Srivastava, Satish Chand, N.K. Singh, Yashpal Singh Bisht, Hemant Dasila, Rajendra Bhatt, Kahkashan Perveen, Najat A. Bukhari
